1.content: You wake up after you plane crashed on this masterious island. “Ugh! Where am I?” You ask yourself. You find some of your items scattered along the sand. You look around confused. “What is this place?” You then find a path made out of cobblestone pieces. You begin to walk up the cobblestone path. You then arrive at a fork in the rode. You see a sign that is pointing to four different villages. Which village do you go to? (Village 1) (village 2) (village 3) (village 4)
1.title: Beginning your adventure

11.content: You decide to head to the first village to try and get some help from the people who live there. You then arrive at the first village. You don’t see any humans in the villlage. A slime creature then comes up to you. https://aryion.com/g4/data/560108-12543.... “Hello stranger welcome to our village”. “Here I will bring you to my VBM”. He then leads you to his VBM named?
11.title: Village 1

info.brief_description: You crash on this island named bloop island
info.description:
After you plane gets hit by something big you crash on a island called bloop island filled with these creatures called bloops

I have to give half the credit of this story to my friend mirrormind101/bill
https://aryion.com/g4/derivative/555978-12543-preview.jpg
